author: By Jeremy B. White, Carla Marinucci, Graph Massara and Aaron Leathley
title: NEWSOM vindicated as FLORIDA, GEORGIA lock down — GOOGLE pitches in — UC suspends requirements — WARREN pushes gig companies — ‘SPLIT ROLL’ measure submitting 1.7M signatures
content:
THE BUZZ Gov. Gavin Newsom is looking awfully prescient.
It was two weeks ago that Newsom issued a then-unprecedented order for 40 million California residents to stay at home,saying the dramatic measure was critical to prevent a hospital-crippling wave of c… [+13863 chars]
